events.name: Boss Nacho @ Maywood
events.description: Boss Nacho live at the Maywood. Openers include Chief Guacamole and Honcho Horchata.

events.name: Led Zeppelin @ Lincoln Theatre
events.description: Led Zeppelin reunion tour kickoff show. Herman's Hermits open.

events.name: Snarky Puppy @ NCMA
events.description: Snarky Puppy, live in the outdoor amphitheater at the North Carolina Museum of Art.

events.name: Vulfpeck @ Cat's Cradle
events.description: Vulfpeck grooves at Cat's Cradle in the heart of Paris of the Piedmont.

events.name: London Symphony Orchestra @ Pinhook
events.description: The world-renowned London Symphony Orchestra plays Durham for the first time at the recently-saved Pinhook.

events.name: Umphrey's McGee @ The Ritz
events.description: Umphrey's, fresh off their performance at the Master's in Augusta, plays the capital city.
